The four bases of psychic power [an8.70:: Made them a vehicle and a basis
The causes and reasons for a great earth: The wind stirs the water, and the water stirs the earth
An ascetic or brahmin with psychic power or a mighty and powerful god shakes the earth
The being intent on awakening passes away from the host of Joyful Gods
The being intent on awakening comes out of his mother’s belly
The Realized One realizes the supreme perfect awakening
The Realized One rolls forth the supreme Wheel of Dhamma
The Realized One, mindful and aware, surrenders the life force
The Realized One becomes fully extinguished through the natural principle of extinguishment, without anything left over.
